trans-unit.source: A <token>servicensd</token> is a hierarchical namespace under which an entity can be created and mapped to any arbitrary depth of names at leaf node.
trans-unit.target: A <token>servicensd</token> is a hierarchical namespace under which an entity can be created and mapped to any arbitrary depth of names at leaf node.

trans-unit.source: It is considered the base address of all entities and features created under this namespace.
trans-unit.target: It is considered the base address of all entities and features created under this namespace.

trans-unit.source: In example address below, the bold section is considered the namespace address, which is used to set or get the full path of entities or features of these entities.
trans-unit.target: In example address below, the bold section is considered the namespace address, which is used to set or get the full path of entities or features of these entities.

trans-unit.source: All top level entities, such as <languageKeyword>Queue</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>Topic</languageKeyword> are addressed by this scheme.
trans-unit.target: All top level entities, such as <languageKeyword>Queue</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>Topic</languageKeyword> are addressed by this scheme.

trans-unit.source: You can specify <codeInline>{path}</codeInline> at any depth.
trans-unit.target: You can specify <codeInline>{path}</codeInline> at any depth.

trans-unit.source: Note that the maximum length of an entity name is 290 characters.
trans-unit.target: Note that the maximum length of an entity name is 290 characters.

trans-unit.source: Describes the address of a topic subscription.
trans-unit.target: Describes the address of a topic subscription.

trans-unit.source: Describes the rule of a topic subscription.
trans-unit.target: Describes the rule of a topic subscription.

trans-unit.source: Provides overview of the simplified REST API sets for managing entities.
trans-unit.target: Provides overview of the simplified REST API sets for managing entities.

trans-unit.source: List all messaging entities of certain kind in a flat view.
trans-unit.target: List all messaging entities of certain kind in a flat view.

trans-unit.source: Performs query string operations for passing data to web applications.
trans-unit.target: Performs query string operations for passing data to web applications.
